page.title: 11Shopping- Kimberworth Park
page.content: In the middle of St Johns Green is an irregular shape of grass.It has a path in the centre leading to the church. It is made of cobbles. On the grass are a lot of trees there are seven of them. Next to the grass is the back of the doctors and dentists above that are flats.Next to the path is a steet lamp. At the otherside is an Old Age Pensioners Reading Room and Rent Office. The Shops at St.Johns Green. Fish & Chip shop, Hair Dressers,Butchers,Clothes Shop,Wool Shop,Newsagents,Bakery,Post Office, Chemist,Grocers,Liptons,Co-op,Video Shop,Electric Shop,Doctors Surgery, Dentists,Pubs,Clubs,Church,Library and an Old Peoples Home.
